title: Account banned?
body: Alright, I tried logging into my account this morning only to find out that I was permanently suspended...I'm told to check my email but to my surprise there is no email. I have already submitted a ticket to try and find out why my account my suspended but I still found it odd that I didn't receive an email...I start trying to figure out why I didn't get an email and I go check my account settings and realize that my email has been changed...I try and change my email back to my original email but it says a passcode was sent to the email to confirm the email change. Clearly I won't be able to get that passcode because I have no access to the email thats currently linked to my account. My question now becomes, if there is a passcode necessary to change the email then how was it changed? I checked my email account for all previous LoL emails and there isn't a single one asking for a passcode to confirm an email change.

replies.body: We applied a security lock on the account to protect it from unusual activity.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), which will allow you to use an email address you currently have access to.  We'll be able to help with recover through there, and reply back as soon as we can.  We got your back!
